casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America ex rel. Carmine ZOCCOLILLO, Petitioner-Appellant, v. Hon. Harold W. FOLLETTE, Warden of Green Haven Prison, Stormville, New York, Respondent-Appellee. No. 280, Docket 30829. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued Nov. 14, 1969. Decided Nov. 18, 1969. Francis R. Snodgrass, New York City (Milton Adler, New York City), for petitioner-appellant. Brenda Soloff, Asst. Atty. Gen. (Louis J. Lefkowitz, Atty. Gen. of the State of New York, New York City, and Samuel A. Hirshowitz, First Asst. Atty. Gen., on the brief), for respondent-appellee.

Before MOORE, KAUFMAN and HAYS, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

Judgment affirmed on the opinion of Judge Frankel, D.C., 306 F.Supp. 500.
